TEXT.TITLE: ARNOX <ARNX.O> STILL IN MERGER TALKS WITH TXL
TEXT.BODY: Arnox Corp said a special committee of its board is continuing talks with <TXL Corp> on the terms of TXL's offer to acquire Arnox at 10 dlrs per share. It said TXL has arranged preliminary financing. Reuter
